channel.title: Summit on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Summit on Joone Blog

item.title: 2007 South-North Korean Summit
item.description: South Korean president Rho Moo-hyun and North Korean leader Kim Jeong-il had a historical summit meeting at Pyungyang in North Korea. This is the second summit between the two Koreas. During the summit, Two leaders had several talks about Korean peace, economic investment, and reunification on North Korea. I wish that the two Koreas could archive piece and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula.
